import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); const [submitStatus, setSubmitStatus] = useState(null); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prevData => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Here you would normally send the form data to your backend // For now, we'll just simulate a successful submission setSubmitStatus('success'); // Clear the form setFormData({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); // Reset status after 5 seconds setTimeout(() => { setSubmitStatus(null); }, 5000); }; return (
